ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( NOT($User.ByPassValidationRule__c), NOT(ISBLANK( PersonEmail )), NOT(REGEX( PersonEmail ,'([a-zA-Z0-9_\\-\\.]+)@((\\[a-z]{1,3}\\.[a-z]{1,3}\\.[a-z]{1,3}\\.)|(([a-zA-Z0-9\\-]+\\.)+))([a-zA-Z]{2,4}|[0-9]{1,3})')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: L'adresse email doit contenir un "@" et un "."
